main event: An unidentified bright light was observed moving slowly at low altitude and reversing direction in Chico, California.
interesting points: The observation took place on February 12, 1950, at 2:30 PM.,The object was described as a glowing bright light., The observer, GQC, had insufficient data for further evaluation., Another report from August 2, 1952, mentioned a brilliant light moving at a high rate of speed., Multiple observers provided similar descriptions of the unidentified light.
witness description: GQC observed the light, while Mr. Robert G. Kavanaugh was another observer in a later report.
